long_description: Keep this superbright Swiss-Tech Micro-Light Ice LED light on your keyring or backpack, and you'll never fumble for a door lock or tent zipper again. Soft-squeeze on/off button. 100,000+ hours LED bulb emits a bright white light. Silicone housing creates luminescent glow. Comes with two CR1616 3V lithium batteries which can be replaced. Comes in assorted colors only; sorry, specific color requests cannot be accommodated.
short_description: Keep this superbright Swiss-Tech Micro-Light Ice LED light on your keyring or backpack, and you'll never fumble for a door lock or tent zipper again.
